TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit XmlSchemaValidationException extends System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException

Docs.summary: Represents the exception thrown when XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema validation errors and warnings are encountered in an XML document being validated.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig instance void SetSourceObject(object sourceObject) cil managed

Docs.summary: Sets the XML node that causes the error.
Gets the XML node that caused this .
Docs.value: The XML node that caused this .

remarks.format:
## Remarks When an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException> is thrown during validation of a class that implements the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> interface such as the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> or <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> class, the object returned by the SourceObject property is an instance of a class that implements the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> interface.
When an <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaValidationException> is thrown during validation by a validating <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object, the value of the SourceObject property is `null`.

Docs.returns: The XML node that caused this .
